api/Booseapp.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | boosedocumentation
api/Booseapp.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace Booseapp Assembly Booseapp.dll Concrete canvas that implements the BOOSE BOOSE.ICanvas contract using a backing Bitmap and Graphics context. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) Create a new canvas with the specified size. public AppCanvas(int xsize, int ysize) Parameters xsize int ysize int Properties PenColour Set the pen colour. Exposes a Color as an object to match ICanvas signature. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Current X position of the pen. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Current Y position of the pen. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Draw a circle centered on the current position. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int filled bool Clear() Clear the canvas (fill white), preserve current position and pen. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) Draw a line from the current position to (x, y) and move the cursor. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int y int MoveTo(int, int) Move the current position without drawing. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int y int Rect(int, int, bool) Draw a rectangle with the top-left corner at the current position. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int height int filled bool Reset() Reset cursor to default position (100,100). Does not clear canvas. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Resize the canvas. Creates a new bitmap and graphics context. public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int SetColour(int, int, int) Change the pen colour using RGB components. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int green int blue int Tri(int, int) Draw an isosceles triangle with the current position as the top-left of its bounding box. Width extends to the right, height extends downward. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int height int WriteText(string) Write text with the current pen colour at the current position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string getBitmap() Expose the underlying bitmap so the host UI can display it. public object getBitmap() Returns object
